bandle city.name: Scuttle Puddle
bandle city.desc: PvE monsters are replaced by scuttle crabs that grant extra loot.

bandle city.name: Yuumi's Zoom Zone
bandle city.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2.

bandle city.name: Bandle Cafeteria
bandle city.desc: Gain a Spatula on stage 2-1. Each round, champions equipped with Spatulas feed Poro Snax to their closest ally and grant them 20 permanent Health for each Spatula component they have.

bilgewater.name: Finn’s Market
bilgewater.desc: Round 3-7 is replaced by a visit to Bilgewater Trader Finn, who will stock either Completed, Artifact, Support, or Radiant items. You can choose one to keep for free!

bilgewater.name: Slaughter Docks
bilgewater.desc: At the Slaughter Docks, you’ll gain free shop rerolls equal to the stage number plus 1 at the start of each stage! These only last for the round you get them, so star up your units and polish off those comps!

bilgewater.name: Rat Town
bilgewater.desc: Starting in Stage 2, Lucky Shops can appear randomly at the start of a round once per stage. These shops feature units tailored to your army's active traits. There’s no discount here, but you’ll save a heck-of-a-lot in rerolls.

demacia.name: House Lightshield
demacia.desc: Gain a Crown of Demacia on stage 2-1. If the holder dies, you instantly lose the fight.

demacia.name: Ehrenmount
demacia.desc: Gain 3 component anvils at the start of the game.

freljord.name: Hearth-Home
freljord.desc: On stage 4-5, gain a Masterwork Upgrade consumable that lets you upgrade one equipped item into its radiant version.

freljord.name: Ornn's Forge
freljord.desc: Randomly on either stage 2-5 or 3-5, gain an Ornn Item Anvil.

freljord.name: Valar's Hollow
freljord.desc: In Valar’s Hollow, you’ll gain an Item Anvil on 2-3 and a Support Anvil on 3-3.

ionia.name: The Dreaming Pool
ionia.desc: At the start of each stage, gain a champ that really fits your team!

ionia.name: God-Willow's Grove
ionia.desc: A spot on your bench becomes the grove. The unit in it contributes their traits as though they were in your army.

ionia.name: Placidium Library
ionia.desc: Gain a Scroll of Knowledge on stage 3-5. Use it on a champion to open an armory offering every emblem that matches their traits.

ixtal.name: Serpentine River
ixtal.desc: Get those just chatting fingers ready for this one! Instead of carousel rounds, vote for what bonus the lobby should get! Get a component anvil after each voting round.

ixtal.name: Ixaocan
ixtal.desc: With this portal, everyone loves a reroll player! Each time players star up 20 units, all players gain increasingly valuable loot.

ixtal.name: Cardinal Arcology
ixtal.desc: Cardinal Arcology, which will always offer a Prismatic, Gold, and Silver Augment.

noxus.name: Noxkraya
noxus.desc: Each time you take an augment, a random arena hex appears. Units on an arena hex gain an item that they can use.

noxus.name: Immortal Bastion
noxus.desc: On stage 2-1, gain a placeable battle flag that grants 20% Attack Speed and a 20% max Health shield to units that start combat adjacent to it.

noxus.name: Fleshing Arena
noxus.desc: Twice per stage, get a free high-tier champion. The champion's tier increases with game time.

piltover.name: Jayce's Workshop
piltover.desc: All augments offered this game will be prismatic.

piltover.name: The University
piltover.desc: The first augment offered this game will be prismatic.

piltover.name: Stillwater Hold
piltover.desc: Whenever you would be offered an augment, gain a completed item anvil instead.

shadow isles.name: Thresh's Sanctum
shadow isles.desc: When ANY unit dies, collect their soul. Every 40 souls, gain a loot orb.

shadow isles.name: Yorick's Graveyard
shadow isles.desc: Every time a player dies, all players open an armory containing 4 of the eliminated players' completed items.

shurima.name: Warlord's Palace
shurima.desc: Stage 4-7 is replaced by a treasure armory round. Each reroll costs 2.

shurima.name: Shuriman Bazaar
shurima.desc: Each champion on a component carousel has 2 components on them instead of 1.

shurima.name: Shifting Sands
shurima.desc: At the start of every round, champions on the @BenchSlots@ rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

targon.name: The Summit
targon.desc: Starting at stage 3, gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator at the start of each stage. On stage 5 and beyond, gain a Champion Duplicator instead.

targon.name: Targon Prime
targon.desc: When you reach 40 Health, receive a blessing from the Targonian gods.

targon.name: Marus Omegnum
targon.desc: On stage 2-5 and 4-5, gain a Tactician's Crown.

void.name: Unstable Rift
void.desc: Gain an unstable completed item that pops off and transforms into a random item every round.

void.name: The Rupture
void.desc: Travel to a random location that is not currently shown.

void.name: The Hall Of The Nine
void.desc: At the start of each stage, everyone gets the same loot from a highly varied pool.

zaun.name: The Sump
zaun.desc: There is no interest this game. Instead, starting on stage 2-1, gain 3 gold every round.

zaun.name: Glasc Industries
zaun.desc: Every time you build a completed item, gain 3 gold.

zaun.name: Ecliptic Vaults
zaun.desc: Every time you select an augment, gain 4 gold per augment you have.

champions.name: Champion Duplicator
champions.desc: Start the game with a Champion Duplicator.

champions.name: 3 Champions
champions.desc: Start the game with 3 random Tier 1 champions.

champions.name: Champion Delivery
champions.desc: Twice per stage, gain a high cost champion. The cost increases with game time.

fight.name: Unit Accelerator
fight.desc: Your team gains bonus Attack Speed and movement speed.

fight.name: Wandering Trainers
fight.desc: Start with a Training Dummy with 3 permanently attached trait emblems.

headliner.name: Multi-Talented
headliner.desc: Headliners grant +1 to another one of their traits.

headliner.name: Showtime
headliner.desc: Higher cost Headliners show up sooner.

loot.name: Loaded Carousels
loot.desc: Component carousels have an extra component on each champion.

loot.name: Scuttle Puddle
loot.desc: PVE enemies are replaced by crabs that drop bonus loot!

loot.name: Crab Rave
loot.desc: Dancing Crabs replace PvE encounters and drop bonus loot, but crabs on Stage 5+ are EXTREMELY DANGEROUS. Grants loot every other stage in Hyper Roll.

loot.name: Loot Subscription
loot.desc: Every stage, gain random loot from a highly varied pool.

loot.name: Treasure Armory
loot.desc: On stage 4-7, choose a 5-piece package of powerful loot. This occurs on Stage 8-1 in Hyper Roll.

loot.name: Radiant Blessing
loot.desc: At 40 player health, receive a blessing that contains powerful loot. This occurs at 10 player health in Hyper Roll

gold.name: Augment Payout
gold.desc: Every time you select an augment, gain 3 gold per augment you have.

gold.name: Item Payout
gold.desc: When you build items, gain gold.

gold.name: Pot of Gold
gold.desc: At stage 6-1, all living players split a pot of 120 gold.

anvils.name: Radiant Item
anvils.desc: On stage 3-7, gain a Magnetic Remover and choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Radiant items are powerful versions of core items.

anvils.name: Artifact Anvil
anvils.desc: Start with an Artifact Anvil that lets you choose from powerful items with unique effects.

champions.name: Champion Conference
champions.desc: Every stage, gain a champion that fits your team.

champions.name: Champion Delivery
champions.desc: Twice per stage, gain a high cost champion. The value goes up with game time.

champions.name: Champion Duplicator
champions.desc: Start the game with a Champion Duplicator.

anvils.name: Anvil Buffet
anvils.desc: All items drop as component anvils.

anvils.name: Let 'Em Cook
anvils.desc: Start with a Spatula and a Frying Pan.

anvils.name: Radiant Item
anvils.desc: On stage 3-7, gain a Magnetic Remover and select 1 of 5 Radiant items.

gold.name: Gold Subscription
gold.desc: Every stage, gain a random amount of gold. All players gain the same amount.

gold.name: Item Payout
gold.desc: Every time you build a completed item, gain 2 gold.

gold.name: Pot of Gold
gold.desc: At stage 6-1, all living players split a pot of 250 gold.

loot.name: Crab Rave
loot.desc: Dancing crabs replace monsters and drop bonus loot, but crabs on Stage 5+ are EXTREMELY DANGEROUS.

loot.name: Loaded Carousels
loot.desc: Each champion on a component carousel has 2 components on them instead of 1.

loot.name: Loot Subscription
loot.desc: Every stage, gain random loot from a highly varied pool.

loot.name: Radiant Blessing
loot.desc: At 40 player health, receive a blessing that contains powerful loot.

loot.name: Scuttle Puddle
loot.desc: Monsters are replaced by crabs that drop bonus loot.

loot.name: Trainer Golems
loot.desc: Start with a Golem with 3 permanently attached emblems.

charms.name: Overachievers
charms.desc: Powerful Charms may appear earlier in the game.

normal encounters.name: Component Anvils
normal encounters.desc: Vi tosses you two component anvils.

normal encounters.name: Golden Gala
normal encounters.desc: Annie changes all augments to gold tier this game.

normal encounters.name: Gold Subscription
normal encounters.desc: Twisted Fate grants you gold every stage.

normal encounters.name: Scuttle Puddle
normal encounters.desc: Neeko transforms all the monsters into crabs that drop bonus loot.

normal encounters.name: Crab Rave
normal encounters.desc: Neeko transforms all the monsters into crabs that drop bonus loot, but crabs on Stage 5+ are SUPER DEADLY.

normal encounters.name: Loot Subscription
normal encounters.desc: Urgot dredges you up some loot from a highly varied pool each stage.

normal encounters.name: Artifact Anvil
normal encounters.desc: Zed gives you an Artifact Anvil.

normal encounters.name: Prismatic Party
normal encounters.desc: Zac's virus turns all the augments Prismatic.

normal encounters.name: Prismatic Prelude
normal encounters.desc: Aurora swaps the first augment to prismatic this game.

normal encounters.name: Prismatic Finale
normal encounters.desc: Aurora swaps the last augment to prismatic this game.

normal encounters.name: Trainer Golems
normal encounters.desc: Garen programs a Golem with 3 Emblems attached.

hacked encounters.name: Golem Armory
hacked encounters.desc: Pick a Golem unit with 1 of 3 combat roles at the end of stage 4!

hacked encounters.name: Egg Armory
hacked encounters.desc: Pick an egg with 1 of 3 hatching times at the start of Stage 4!

hacked encounters.name: Lucky Shops
hacked encounters.desc: Once per stage, a lucky shop tailored to your traits can appear!

hacked encounters.name: Two-Star Shops
hacked encounters.desc: Two-star units can appear in your shop!

hacked encounters.name: Augment Round Swap
hacked encounters.desc: The augment rounds have been moved earlier this game.

hacked encounters.name: Fourth Augment
hacked encounters.desc: There will be an extra augment round in stage 2!

hacked encounters.name: Fourth Augment
hacked encounters.desc: There will be an extra augment round at the end of stage 3!

hacked encounters.name: Fourth Augment
hacked encounters.desc: There will be an extra augment round at the end of stage 4!

hacked encounters.name: Fourth Augment
hacked encounters.desc: There will be an extra augment round at the start of stage 5!

hacked encounters.name: Treasure Armory
hacked encounters.desc: The Stage 4 NPC round is replaced with a rerollable Treasure Armory!

hacked encounters.name: Reroll Subscription
hacked encounters.desc: Twisted Fate grants you free Shop rerolls every stage.

hacked encounters.name: P0T 0F G0LD
hacked encounters.desc: After every Carousel round, players vote to split a pot of gold or increase the pot.
